overview.title: Tabs Component
overview.description: Tabs are a navigation element used to switch between different views within the same context.

js.title: JavaScript
js.description: JS is required to handle switching between tab panels.

best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Use ARIA roles like `tablist`, `tab`, and `tabpanel` for accessibility.

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of using a tabs component?
answers: To organize content and save screen space
questions.answer: To organize content and save screen space
